metadata.title: CVE-2019-2213 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In binder_free_transaction of binder.c, there is a possible use-after-freedue to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-133758011References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-60-generic - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-4.15.0-60-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-4.15.0-60-lowlatency - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-60-generic - 4.15.0-60.67
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-60-lowlatency - 4.15.0-60.67
No subscription required
